title: Excellent location great quality reasonable price
text: The hotel is right in the centre of the Loop - the heart of Chicago. Within a walking distance to the Theater District and all of the museums. Great spot, excellent bathroom (all walls in marble). Tiny room, no fridge, but - hey! - again, excellent location :)))Fitness centre on 25th floor overlooking the city, business centre with 24hour access to internet - opens with the guest room card, wifi with additional charge.
